subject: ATTENTION  Attention :Sir/Ma
body:
ATTENTION  Attention :Sir/Madam
This is to bring to your notice that i have approved your payment via
ATM CARD and we are  going to deliver the ATM card to your address .
You are advise to reconfirm your address and telephone number  because
i am already in United States of America already , you can
contact me  via direct number +1-8189628711
YOU ARE ADVISE TO SEND ME TEXT ON THIS NUMBER +1-8189628711  WITH
YOUR ADDRESS SO THAT I WILL DELIVER TODAY
MY name is DR PAUL GARRY
Email: 
garrypaul1972@gmail.com
Phone: +1-8189628711
Endeavor to indicate the ATM parcel registration number  which
is ( ATM-087RZ ) when contacting them.
Sincerely yours,
DR PAUL GARRY

subject: Re:   ATTENTION  Attention :Sir/Ma
body:
Hello DR PAUL GARRY,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the update regarding the approval of my payment via ATM card. It's great to hear that it will be delivered to my address soon.

Before I provide you with my address and telephone number, could you please clarify a few things for me? Firstly, which company or organization is responsible for delivering the ATM card? Secondly, what is the purpose of indicating the ATM parcel number when contacting them?

I want to make sure that everything is in order before proceeding further. Thank you for your understanding.

Best wishes,
William
